fields.request: Manual QA: Confirm Celery and Graphviz debug logs stay quiet
fields.request_details: Set DEBUG=False in the environment and restart the web and Celery worker services. With the worker running at the normal log level, run `python manage.py shell -c "from core.tasks import heartbeat; heartbeat.delay()"` to enqueue a task and visit the admin model graph at /admin/model-graph/core/ to trigger Graphviz rendering. Inspect the active application log in logs/<active_app>.log and confirm there are no DEBUG entries from `celery` or `graphviz._tools`; only INFO (or higher) messages should appear for those loggers.
